ygData.messageBody:
> There are 3 messages in this issue.

Three message, but with no snipping, it truncated on my email system!!! Please
remember that when you reply to a digest to trim up some of the message, it the
only courteous thing to do!

Buddy.
Fenthorne, 8th season Enchanter on Veeshan
